description.value:
At the end of each of their turns, the ashen hoarder can take [[/damage 10]] damage to end one effect on them that can be ended by a saving throw. This damage can't be reduced in any way.

The ashen hoarder can take two turns each round. They can't take turns consecutively.
An adjacent enemy who grabs the ashen hoarder or uses a melee ability against them takes [[/damage 3]] damage.

When the ashen hoarder is reduced to 0 Stamina, they explode in a swirling singularity of bone shards and soul energy. Each creature within 5 squares of the ashen hoarder who has M < 3 takes [[/damage 11 corruption]] damage. A creature killed by this damage has their soul sucked into the vortex and lost somewhere in the Abyssal Wasteland, and can't be brought back to life until their soul is recovered.

tier1.display: if one target has {{potency}} they are bleeding (save ends)
if the other target {{potency}} they are grabbed

effect.after: The ashen hoarder can have up to two size 1 creatures grabbed at a time.
3 Malice: The ashen hoarder targets a second 4 cube within distance.

spend.text: Any enemy weakened this way is instead slowed and weakened (save ends).

effect.after: An impaled creature is restrained and bleeding, and moves with the ashen hoarder. The ashen hoarder can have three creatures impaled with this ability at a time.

effects.name: Impaled
effects.description: An impaled creature is restrained and bleeding, and moves with the ashen hoarder. The ashen hoarder can have three creatures impaled with this ability at a time.

effect.before: The ashen hoarder moves up to twice their speed in a straight line. Each creature or object in the path of this movement is either pushed into the nearest unoccupied space outside the path, or if they have M < 3 is pushed forward until the movement ends. Any creature who is force moved forward into an obstacle is dazed (save ends).

The ashen hoarder halves the damage. If the ashen hoarder has one or more creatures impaled, the Malice cost of this feature is reduced by 1 and one impaled creature takes the other half of the damage.

effect.after: Each target is force moved straight up, then falls. A target who would normally land prone after falling is instead restrained (save ends).

effect.before: The ashen hoarder sprays out six size 1M zombie mines that appear in unoccupied squares within distance. Any enemy who moves adjacent to a zombie mine for the first time in a round or starts their turn there causes the mine to explode, dealing [[/damage 4 corruption]] damage to each creature adjacent to the mine. Any other zombie mines adjacent to the exploding mine also explode. At the start of each of the ashen hoarder's turns, each unexploded zombie mine can be moved up to 2 squares.
The ashen hoarder moves up to their speed and uses Claw and Blade with a double edge against one target. On a tier 3 outcome, the ashen hoarder can use Impale without spending Malice.
The ashen hoarder moves up to their speed and can make a free strike against two targets.

The ashen hoarder summons a 10 wall of bones and blades into unoccupied squares within 5 squares of them. Each square of the wall has 5 Stamina. An enemy who comes adjacent to the wall for the first time in a round or starts their turn there takes [[/damage 3]] damage.

The ashen hoarder takes an additional main action on their turn.

They can use this feature even if they are dazed.

The ashen hoarder launches bone lances into the air, raining them

down on enemies and impaling those unlucky enough to be on

the receiving end. Each enemy within 20 squares of the ashen

hoarder makes an Agility test.

11 or less

[[/damage 14]] damage; restrained and bleeding (save ends)

12-16

[[/damage 11]] damage; bleeding (EoT)

17+

[[/damage 6]] damage
